thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan's Relationship With His Youngest Child, AbRam, Is The Cutest Thing!
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan's Relationship With His Youngest Child, AbRam, Is The Cutest Thing!

title: Shah Rukh Khan's Relationship With His Youngest Child, AbRam, Is The Cutest Thing!
text:
facebook 461 SHARES 
Ever since the birth of his youngest son, AbRam, Shah Rukh Khan cannot get enough of the little one. And we don't blame him, he is beyond adorable! The doting father puts up multiple pictures and posts about the little one, across his social media platforms, each one cuter than the last. Just yesterday, the actor put up a picture of AbRam on Twitter, along with the sweetest statement - "My conversations with my 3 & something baby r the most enlightening. The rest is just talk...". What a beautiful father-son relationship, right? Take a look at the post, here. My conversations with my 3 & something baby r the most enlightening. The rest is just talk... pic.twitter.com/5fXxUuSSe6
